ModMetaData.name: StarWars - Hutts Species
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
"Hutts were a large slug-like sentient species who were native to the planet Nal Hutta. They were well known as galactic gangsters whose Grand Hutt Council controlled the Hutt Clan crime syndicate"
[h1]Features:[/h1] - Hutts Race - Hutts Faction
Commissioned by "JangoD'soul" for "MeatyClackers#6999" from "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
[h1]Credits:[/h1] -StarsWars -JangoDsoul- Art and XML coder
